metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel suggests Wyll's hero act is for attention. Wyll says he can't help if his goodness made him famous.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: The Blade of Frontiers, hm? Do you always need to be the centre of attention?

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: Anything but. I don't fight to be flattered, Lae'zel. I fight to save lives.
